name: Launch Experiment
description: Launch experiment using Python based plugin

configStructure.name: name
configStructure.description: Optional name for this execution instance

configStructure.name: setupJupyterNB
configStructure.description: Setup an instance of the Jupyter Notebook for running the experiment interactively

configStructure.name: generateRosLaunch
configStructure.description: Generate ROS Launch files from the system assembly model as appropriate.

configStructure.name: setupAndBuildRepo
configStructure.description: If the model is using repo, set this flag to True for setup (clone or pull) and (re-)building the repo
